page.title: 10ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My dad works for Moffats in Devizes.He takes a van round the southern part of England .Not so far as Somerset and Southampton .He sometimes goes to Bristol .He goes round filling up cigarette machines in small shops and parks.He also takes the money out of them and counts it up .He is usually out of the house before I get up .He takes his van into Devizes loads it up with cigarettes and then starts his journey.He knows where to go because he is given his route at the beging of the week .When my mum had a job she worked at Moffats doing typeing .Now she doesnt work there .But does some house work on Wednesdays,Mondays,and Fridays .At two houses in Wedhampton.She goes about 9:00 am and comes home about 1:00 pm.
